A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So\, Luke is a failure\, and parents aren't important. The boy who has a mother\, father and uncle who love him\, becomes the most evil person in the galaxy and is not worth saving\, from his families perspective. And the one who's parents sold her for drinking money is their savior. \nSnoke\, Phasma\, the Unknown Regions\, all of the amazing lore created since Disney took over has been flushed down the toilet.
